p: Among the various endocrine disrupting chemicals (EDCs), bisphenol-A (BPA) is the most vital synthetic compound with annual production greater than 3.8 million tons [ 1]. BPA chemical name is 4,4 '-dihydroxy-2,2-diphenyl propane, its formula is (CH 3) 2C (C 6H 4OH) 2 (or C 15H 16O 2), its CAS No. is 80-05-7, and its chemical structure is shown in ( Fig. 1). It is a synthetic monomer used in production of polycarbonate plastics, epoxy resins, food packaging, dental sealant, water pipes, toys, fire retardant, plastic bottles, paints, pesticides and lacquers for food cans [ 2, 3].
